text: "Call Off the Search" is a 2004 by Georgian British singer Katie Melua and is the title track from her debut studio album Call Off the Search. It went to number 19 in the United Kingdom, number 27 in Ireland and number 20 in Scotland. ==Track listings== Version one # "Call Off the Search" (Mike Batt) # "Shirt of a Ghost" (Katie Melua) # "Deep Purple" (Mitchell Parish / Peter De Rose) Version two # "Call Off the Search" (Mike Batt) # "Turn to Tell" (Justin Sandercoe) == References == Category:2004 songs Category:Katie Melua songs
title: Call Off the Search (song)
